attributes.action: Stop Ms Mays big brother charter
attributes.additional_details: Ms May is again trying to sneak in the snoopers charter using the murder of a British soldier as an excuse! MI5 already had all the info available on the two perpetrators and the ability to read our emails and listen to our phone calls would not have helped! The Govt need to realise that the British public will not stand for any more of our freedoms being taken from us under the excuse of public safety! This bill must be consigned to the bin!
